description:
the RIA 7 is a <good>lightweight</good> smg developed by <info>Rubicon Industries</info> 
it's a very light smg and uses <info>five-seven's 5.7mm</info> ammunition 
the weapon is a futuristic submachine gun which is similar to the MP5 due to its look. It has a short barrel, a slightly large magazine and a short buttstock, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the RIA T7 is a lightweight smg developed by <info>Rubicon Industries</info> 
it's a very light smg upgraded from it's brother, the RIA 7, and uses <info>five-seven's 5.7mm</info> ammunition
 the weapon is a futuristic submachine gun which is similar to the MP5 due to its look. It has a short barrel, a slightly large magazine and a short buttstock, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
